name: A little Tale
description:
Follow our protagonist, a farmers son, through his little journey to find his father.

A linear story with some puzzle elements.

Solve puzzles to get out of the house.

Find the Book and the Map for hints.

Walk through a pretty valley.

End your journey in the cave.

This game is a little student project for our university.

We used many free model assets, all rights of the assets belong to the creators of said assets.
